text:
It's confusing to have 2 haxby fetchers. In addition, it puts strains on generating the documentation (more downloads, less shared path to cache) and it clogs the download folders of people.

I vote to remove fetch_haxby_simple. The examples should all be changed accordingly.
title: Get rid of fetch_haxby_simple

text: Maybe a not so easy part: shouldn't we delete or issue a warning if a user updates the software and has already downloaded haxby_simple? I'm trying to avoid unnecessary disk occupation.
